Estonia: Estonians are defeated by Sword Brothers in the Battle of Turaida in Latvia.
Sword Brothers are defeated by Estonians in the Battle of Viljandi.
Estonians raid crusader areas in Latvia.
China: Emperor Shenzong of Western Xia deposed and replaced Xiangzong as emperor of Western Xia.
Battle of Yehuling: The army of the Mongol Empire captured or killed over four hundred thousand Jin soldiers defending an important mountain pass at Zhangjiakou.
Burma: Sithu II dies and Htilominlo succeeds
